text: Gänsbrunnen railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Gänsbrunnen, in the Swiss canton of Solothurn. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Solothurn–Moutier line of BLS AG and is served by local trains only. == Services == The following services stop at Gänsbrunnen: * Regio: hourly service between and . == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Solothurn Category:BLS railway stations
title: Gänsbrunnen railway station
